instructions: Put the plate on the charger.
Put the napkin on the plate.
Put the dinner fork on the left side of the plate with the prongs turned up
Put the salad fork on the left side on the dinner fork, their bottoms on the same level.
Put the dinner knife on the right side of the dinner plate with the blade towards the dinner plate
Put the tea spoon on the right side of the knife
Put the soup spoon on the right side of the tea spoon
Put the water glass on the top right side of the plate
Put the wine glass on the right side on the water glass
Put another wine glass under the first wine glass
Put the coffee cup on the right side of the wine glass
Put the bread plate on the top left side of the plate
Put the butter knife on top of the bread plate with the blade facing down and pointing to the left
Put the dessert fork above the dinner plate with the prongs facing right
Put the dessert spoon above the dinner plate and below the dessert fork with the handle facing right
